articles.title: Oracle’s Topsy-Turvy Year Won’t Get Any Easier in 2026
articles.mainIdea: Oracle’s Topsy-Turvy Year Won’t Get Any Easier in 2026
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Oracle’s Topsy-Turvy Year Won’t Get Any Easier in 2026. Oracle and Chairman Larry Ellison spent the year chasing cloud computing, social media, and Hollywood studios. Related tickers mentioned: ORCL, PSKY, WBD.

Nike rises after Apple CEO Tim Cook snaps up shares, while Tesla stock drops amid door safety investigation. articles.title: Should You Sell Netflix Stock Before It Wins the Warner Bros Takeover?
articles.mainIdea: Should You Sell Netflix Stock Before It Wins the Warner Bros Takeover?
articles.summary: Barchart: Should You Sell Netflix Stock Before It Wins the Warner Bros Takeover?. Netflix stock faces near-term pressure from its blockbuster bid for Warner Bros. assets, even as Wall Street remains largely bullish on the company’s long-term growth prospects. Related tickers mentioned: CMCSA, WBD.
